const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "custom_fingerprint_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        whitespace_: {
          tokenizer: "whitespace",
          filter: ["fingerprint_plus_concat"],
        },
      },
      filter: {
        fingerprint_plus_concat: {
          type: "fingerprint",
          max_output_size: 100,
          separator: "+",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
